education.institution: BVRIT HYDERABAD College of Engineering for Women

achievements.title: 3rd Place Winner
achievements.description: Won 3rd Place in the Generative AI Hackathon among 80 mentees selected from 18000+ applicants (top 0.00001%)

achievements.title: LinkedIn Coachin Mentee
achievements.description: Chosen for an exclusive five-month mentorship program empowering women in tech, selected from over 18,000 applicants (top 0.4%) as one of 80 mentees from across India.

achievements.title: Student Upskilling LaunchPad
achievements.description: Received technical interview preparation, and career development training to build a competitive edge for roles in technology as a part of the invite-only program.

achievements.title: DESIS Ascend Educare Mentee
achievements.description: Selected as one of 80 women from 18,000+ applicants (top 0.4%) from across India for the six-month mentorship program.

competitive_programming.details: Solved 900+ problems and participated in 40+ contests

projects.title: MentorMatch.ai
projects.description: Designed and developed an AI-powered mentorship platform connecting students and professionals, featuring intelligent mentor matching, personalized learning roadmaps, progress tracking, contextual feedback, AI-driven interviews and assessments, real-time chat, and mentor-mentee meet scheduling — built as part of the LinkedIn Coachin Program.

projects.title: Slotify - The Timetable Generator
projects.description: Designed and developed an automated timetable generator using a hybrid Greedy + Genetic Algorithm approach, tailored to institution-specific academic rules and constraints, to generate conflict-free class schedules at the start of each semester.

projects.title: FundFlock – Save Money Together
projects.description: Developed a collaborative financial platform for groups to manage shared budgets, track contributions in real-time, and visualize financial goals — built during the DESIS Ascend Educare Program.

projects.title: MasterWord
projects.description: Contributed to the development of Masterword, a word-based gaming platform featuring two game modes — Wordle and Mastermind — supporting real-time game logic, user statistics tracking, and complete gameplay history with performance insights.

projects.title: Automated Birthday Email System
projects.description: Designed and developed a solo automation project that identifies students whose birthdays fall on the current date and automatically sends them birthday wishes via email.
